posts.text:
1996 Suzuki Vitara
260,000 km
I am moving back to the USA and selling my car.  It runs well but it needs to have the front CV joints and the thermostat replaced so I am lowering the price a lot.  The body is in good condition with only a few minor rust spots.  I am asking 180,000 ISK or best offer.  I also have 4 extra regular size tires I will give away with it.
Features:
-4 cylinder engine, petrol
-Manual transmission 5 gears
-4X4
-Fuel injection, 1.590 cc, 97 hp
-31” tires, 15” rims
-Power steering
-Electric windows
-Electric side mirrors
-Heated seats
-Large tires
-Tow ball
